DOC.brief_summary: The objective is to determine, if healing of punch biopsy wounds treated with the fish skin derived MariGen Wound dressing is non-inferior to healing with wounds treated with pig intestines derived Oasis Sheet wound dressing. Secondary endpoints are: Incidence of erythema, Pain, Infection, Quantitative measurements of autoantibodies at baseline and 4 weeks after start of treatment
DOC.brief_title: Healing of Punch Graft Wounds. Comparative Study Between MariGen and Oasis: a Non-inferiority Study
DOC.criteria: >18 yrs Healthy individual Signature of informed consent Autoimmune disease Immunosuppressive treatment Use of addictive drugs Excessive use of alcohol Known fish allergy Known allergy to proteins with porcine origin Peripheral vascular disease Pregnant women Persons receiving anticoagulation therapy or systemic corticosteroids will be excluded.
